#summary Golf Markup Language Documentation: simpleType Rating.

== Name ==

*[SRating Rating]*

  	

===  Super Types ===
{{{
nonNegativeInteger
  |
  +--Rating (restriction)
}}}
----
    

===  Documentation ===
        
			The rating type defines a standard, generic, evaluation criteria for golfml entities.
			Rating is limited to 0 to 5 "stars".
		
  	
===  Properties ===

  	This component is not nillable.
---- 	
        
===  Model ===

	inclusive upper bound: 5

----
    

===  Local Usage ===

    	[CNote Note]
----
    <xs:simpleType name="Rating">  <xs:restriction base="xs:nonNegativeInteger">    <xs:maxInclusive value="5"/>  </xs:restriction></xs:simpleType>
----
